name: performance-evaluation-analyzer
description: This repository is an artifact that contains a tool for evaluating performance between Client-Side and Server-Side Rendering web apps, using sitespeed as the engine for carrying out the evaluations. The main aim of this tool is to generate input for a final year course in Computer Science at the State University of Cear√°, supporting a scientific methodology.

scripts.pre-build: npm install & mkdir projects && concurrently "git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/web_performance_evaluator_tool.git" "cd projects & mkdir anime_vault & cd ./anime_vault & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/anime_vault-csr.git & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/anime_vault-ssr.git" "cd projects & mkdir video-compress & cd ./video-compress & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/video-compress-csr.git & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/video-compress-ssr.git" "cd projects & mkdir folio & cd ./folio & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/folio-csr.git & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/folio-ssr.git" "cd projects & mkdir Mantine-Admin & cd ./Mantine-Admin & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/Mantine-Admin-csr.git & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/Mantine-Admin-ssr.git" "cd projects & mkdir dzajco & cd ./dzajco & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/dzajco-csr.git & git clone https://github.com/Edson1337/dzajco-ssr.git"
scripts.build: cd projects && concurrently "cd ./anime_vault/anime_vault-csr && npm install" "cd ./anime_vault/anime_vault-ssr && npm install" "cd ./video-compress/video-compress-csr && npm install" "cd ./video-compress/video-compress-ssr && npm install" "cd ./folio/folio-csr && npm install" "cd ./folio/folio-ssr && npm install" "cd ./Mantine-Admin/Mantine-Admin-csr && npm install" "cd ./Mantine-Admin/Mantine-Admin-ssr && npm install" "cd ./dzajco/dzajco-csr && npm install" "cd ./dzajco/dzajco-ssr && npm install" "cd ../ && cd ./web_performance_evaluator_tool && python -m venv evaluation_env"
